summary: A documentary about the culture of hip-hop. Through interviews with some of hip-hops biggest names, the film makers attempt to find out why it has become so popular.
cast: Afrika Bambaataa|Kurtis Blow|Sean 'Diddy' Combs|Dr. Dre|Warren G|Andre Harrell|Doc Ice|Kid Capri|Tripp Locc|Craig Mack|Method Man|The Notorious B.I.G.|Raekwon|Slick Rick|Russell Simmons|Snoop Dogg|Wayniac
title: The Show
